hours._text: Monday and Thursday 10am to 6pm Saturday 9am to 5pm Closed 24 December to 2 January

On Tuesdays and Wednesdays, the venue hosts a Kids' Café which is for parents and children under five years old only. During these sessions, the kids are given the space to use toys and soft play equipment. On Thursdays and Fridays, the venue is welcome to all. There will be free hot drinks and biscuits, free WiFi and device charging available at all sessions. Days and times Kids' Café: Tuesday and Wednesday, 10am to 4pm. General public availability: Thursday and Friday, 2pm to 4pm.

properties.address: West Croydon Methodist Church, 93 London Road, Croydon, CR0 2RF, United Kingdom
properties.description:
Warm Wednesday 

  • Activities (e.g. board games, puzzles, reading books, etc.) and hot drinks, cakes and biscuits for  over 55's attending our Warm Wednesday
  • We will bring local organisations together to provide support around bills, loneliness, and signposting older people to the correct service
  • We will have fun, socialise, listen to music and build new and meaningful connections

Parking - Disabled parking - Wheelchair accessible 

Where: West Croydon Methodist Church, 93 London Road, Croydon CR0 2RF (Entrance between Tariq Halal Shop & Lidl in London Road)

When: From 2.30 pm – 4.30 pm  

  • Wednesday 16th November
  • Wednesday 30th November
  • Wednesday 21st December from 2.30 pm – 4.30 pm Christmas edition
  • Wednesday 28th December from 2.30 pm – 4.30 pm New Year’s eve edition

From 2023: Every 2nd & 4th Wednesday of the month from 2.30 pm – 4.30 pm

For more information contact: 07597135220 or southlondon@mha.org.uk

properties.title: The Westway

properties.address: 77 Ashley Rd, Epsom KT18 5AQ

hours._text: Our Warm Wednesdays programme will operate every Wednesday (including over the Christmas period) until the end of February. From 09.000 hot drinks will be available. A choice of soups and a buttered roll will be on offer from 12.30-14.00. From 14.00 we will serve hot drinks and homemade cakes. From 15.00 the focus will be on providing an after-school club with spaces for homework, reading, playing and boardgames. At 17.00 we will serve a hot meal and dessert.
